overview: The Permaculture Chickens film will show you how to raise your own chickens with nature (aka save you money and be more sustainable) really really fast - like in one evening. The Permaculture Chickens film will show you how to raise your own chickens with nature (aka save you money and be more sustainable) really really fast - like in one evening. Years ago my beautiful wife and I were talking at church when she said, "we ought to get some chickens".
title: Permaculture Chickens
